QueryDefinition.Query: select 1 id, patid, (select [start] from hes_linkage_coverage where data_source='hes') as hes_start, (select [end] from hes_linkage_coverage where data_source='hes') as hes_end from HES_linkage_eligibility JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND patid = ch.PERSON_ID where hes_e=1
